column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Chicago's best pizza? Just might be! Service was quick and attentive. Since deep dish takes some time to cook
column2: we were able to order our pizza ahead of time while we waited for a table. We started with Calamari and both the BuffaLou Â and Bar-B-Lou Wings. The Calamari was fried perfectly with a tasty Marinara sauce and the wings were plump and juicy. Just a perfect amount of sauce to not make it too messy to eat! Then out came the star of the meal....The Malnati Chicago Classic. The Buttercrust makes the pizza
column4: extra cheese and vine-ripened tomato sauce. No room for dessert here! Make this the fist pizza place you checkout in Chicago!
